name: cfmap
description: Embeds a Google map within a ColdFusion web page
discouraged: The use of tags generating UI is generally discouraged by the CFML community. See: https://static.raymondcamden.com/cfuitherightway/cfmap/index.html

params.name: width
params.description: Map width, in pixels.

params.name: centerlongitude
params.description: The longitude value for the location, in degrees

params.name: centeraddress
params.description: The address of the location, which is set as the center of the map.

params.name: continuouszoom
params.description: Whether to provide zoom control that enables smooth zooming for the map

params.name: type
params.description: Type of the Google map

params.name: title
params.description: Title of the panel

params.name: zoomcontrol
params.description: Whether to enable zoom control

params.name: tip
params.description: A short description of the center location that appears as a tool tip.

params.name: overview
params.description: Whether to add an Overview panel to the map

params.name: hideborder
params.description: Whether to hide border for surrounding panel

params.name: doubleclickzoom
params.description: Whether to enable double-click zoom

params.name: key
params.description: The API key of the map.

params.name: collapsible
params.description: Whether to provide a collapsible property for the surrounding panel

params.name: zoomlevel
params.description: Specifies the starting zoom value

params.name: height
params.description: Height of the map, in pixels

params.name: centerlatitude
params.description: The latitude value for the location, in degrees.

params.name: onload
params.description: Custom JavaScript function that runs after the map loads..

params.name: typecontrol
params.description: What type of typecontrol to provide. Basic inclueds "map, satellite, hybrid" and Advanced includes "map, satellite, hybrid, earth, terrain"

params.name: displayscale
params.description: Whether to enable scale control

params.name: name
params.description: Name of the map.

params.name: scrollwheelzoom
params.description: Whether to enable mouse wheel zooming control

params.name: markerBind
params.description: Uses a bind expression to fetch markup to be displayed in the infowindow opened when the marker is clicked. This is mutually exclusive with the markerwindowtext attribute. This is inherited by all cfmapitem tags

params.name: showMarkerWindow
params.description: When true, the marker infowindow is shown. By default, this is false. This is inherited by all cfmapitem tags.

params.name: markerWindowContent
params.description: Static inner html markup to be displayed in the infowindow opened when the marker is clicked. This is mutually exclusive with the markerbind attribute

params.name: markerIcon
params.description: Location of the icon to use for the marker.

params.name: markerColor
params.description: marker color in hexadecimal value.

params.name: onError
params.description:
The JavaScript function to run when there is a Google map API error.
The JavaScript function is passed with two parameters, Google map status code and error message.

params.name: showCenterMarker
params.description: Whether to display the marker icon that identifies the map center

params.name: showScale
params.description: Whether to show scale control
